casebody.data:
No. 11-301. Saint-Gobain Ceramics & Plastics, Inc., Petitioner v. Siemens Medical Solutions USA, Inc. 565 U.S. 1012, 132 S. Ct. 570,

181 L. Ed. 2d 395,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7960. November 7, 2011.

The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

Same case below, 637 F.3d 1269.
